description:
OVER 2,500 Students!

Why take this course?

If you are new to Adobe Photoshop or maybe you just need a quick refresher this is a great introductory course for you to get started with. You will walk away with a strong understanding of Photoshop basics that every Pro needs to know. If you need Photoshop for parts of your job or even if you are just curious what Photoshop is all about this is the course for you. This crash style course will get you up and running in Photoshop until you are ready to learn more.

What's in this course?

This course describes the tools and knowledge everyone needs to know when they begin using Adobe Photoshop. We will discuss everything from opening your first picture, the importance of layers, how to use some famous retouching tools, and how to export and save your images.

Who is teaching this course?

Your instructor is none other than Josh Kostreva. He has a Master's degree in media and communications. He has worked for national radio programs, international television shows, and the U.S. Government providing expertise in the field of visual arts and communications. He has been using Adobe Photoshop for over 17 years and wants to share his expertise with you!
title: Photoshop CC - Beginner's Survival Guide
